com.naio.canreader.activities

Class MainActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.naio.canreader.activities.MainActivity

  • public class MainActivity
extends Activity
    MainActivity call a function every 1 ms when the Read button is pressed, this function read the FIFO filled by CanDumpThread and display it on the screen. Also the button connect allow to mount the can interface. And other buttons will be added ...
    Author:
    bodereau

      boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu) 
      boolean onOptionsItemSelected(MenuItem item) 
      private void read_the_can()
      Function call by the runnable, it read the FIFO of CanDumpThread with the get100Poll function ( which extract 100 values dumped or less if there is not 100 values ) and parse the data with CanParser to finally call the action method of the CanFrame class instantiate by the CanParser.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • button_read_clicked

        public void button_read_clicked(View v)
        Action performed by the READ button. Run the runnable in 1 ms ( that will be run in a loop ) This runnable going to read the FIFO filled by a candump
        Parameters:
        v -

      • button_connect_clicked

        public void button_connect_clicked(View v)
        Action performed by the CONNECT button. Mount the can interface with a bitrate of 1000K
        Parameters:
        v -

      • read_the_can

        private void read_the_can()
        Function call by the runnable, it read the FIFO of CanDumpThread with the get100Poll function ( which extract 100 values dumped or less if there is not 100 values ) and parse the data with CanParser to finally call the action method of the CanFrame class instantiate by the CanParser.

        Parameters:
